author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: Optimism Is Coming Back in the Stock Market – Will it Last?
description: Global stock markets are soaring on Monday as investors cheer the declining COVID-19 rates, but optimism might not last. The post Optimism Is Coming Back in the Stock Market – Will it Last? appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Optimism is gaining the stock market, as COVID-19 cases and deaths are declining globally.
  • While lockdown measures appear to be working, we shouldnt be too optimistic as a second wave of infections might occur.
